workExperiences.title: Web Full Stack Developer - Fuel Cell Store
workExperiences.description1: Updating, maintaining, expanding, and scaling current websites and servers, and designing new company websites.
workExperiences.description2: Consistently create well-designed, tested code using best practices for website development, including mobile and responsive site design.
workExperiences.description3: Analyze web measurement data to make recommendations and implement improvements to further marketing objectives.

workExperiences.title: Back End Developer - Laplace Investment Management
workExperiences.description1: Working closely with web designers and frontend developers to design and implement the company's website.
workExperiences.description2: Used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js to build the website and implement UI improvements.
workExperiences.description3: Participated in daily stand-ups, sprint plannings, and code reviews.

workExperiences.title: Backend Developer Intern - Social Payme
workExperiences.description1: Used React.js with Tailwind.css to render influencer’s personalized webpage according to a given API or JSON.
workExperiences.description2: Created an article scraper to extract article data, ultimately got news articles relating to influencers.
workExperiences.description3: Work collaboratively with the development team to design, develop, and maintain the back-end infrastructure for our social media platforms.

workExperiences.title: Software Engineer Intern - DigiFinex Global
workExperiences.description1: Reviewed documentation and source code of Waves and Decred-Next and completed the integration of these tokens by operating Golang programming language.
workExperiences.description2: Reviewed the Bitcoin and Ethereum source code, completed the private key to public key, the public key to address, calculated summary and generated a transaction, and broadcast.
workExperiences.description3: Conducted development tests and code maintenance to prevent broadcast failure or query hash info failure.

workExperiences.title: 网页全栈工程师 - Fuel Cell Store
workExperiences.description1: 更新、维护、扩展和提升现有网站及服务器的规模，并设计新的公司网站。
workExperiences.description2: 创建设计精良、经过测试的代码，使用网站开发的最佳实践，包括移动端和响应式网站设计。
workExperiences.description3: 分析网站数据，提出建议并实施改进，以进一步实现营销目标。

workExperiences.title: 后端开发工程师 - Laplace Investment Management
workExperiences.description1: 与网页设计师和前端开发人员紧密合作，设计和实施公司网站。
workExperiences.description2: 使用HTML、CSS、JavaScript、React.js构建网站并实施用户界面改进。
workExperiences.description3: 参与日常会议、冲刺计划和代码审查。

workExperiences.title: 后端开发实习生 - Social Payme
workExperiences.description1: 使用React.js和Tailwind.css根据给定的API或JSON渲染影响者的个性化网页。
workExperiences.description2: 创建文章抓取器提取文章数据，最终获取与影响者相关的新闻文章。
workExperiences.description3: 与开发团队合作设计、开发和维护社交媒体平台的后端基础设施。

workExperiences.title: 软件开发实习生 - DigiFinex Global
workExperiences.description1: 审查Waves和Decred-Next的文档和源码，并使用Golang编程语言完成这些代币的集成。
workExperiences.description2: 审查比特币和以太坊的源代码，完成私钥到公钥、公钥到地址的转换，计算总结并生成交易并广播。
workExperiences.description3: 进行开发测试和代码维护，以防止广播失败或查询哈希信息失败。
